meta.title: Core Studio - Graphic Designer
meta.description: Portfolio and landing page presenting the branding, art direction, and editorial design services.

stages.text: CORE STUDIO was born from the idea that every brand has a heart: a nucleus, a center, a deeper meaning. My work always begins there: searching for the essence, for what a brand truly is.

I turn that essence into visual identities, strategies, and a recognizable presence. I shape my clients' visions with coherence and character, highlighting values, style, and personality through design.

I craft clear, memorable, premium visual systems designed for local brands and entrepreneurs who want to stand out in the Italian and international markets. From Sardinia to the world, I follow design wherever it leads me.

items.label: Brand Identity
details: Complete visual identities: logo, palette, typography, visual system, and guidelines. Designed to be recognizable, consistent, and professional.

items.label: Visual & Social Design
details: Graphic templates, visual formats, design for posts and content. A clear, professional aesthetic for businesses, events, and digital projects.

items.label: Materials for local businesses
details: Menus, business cards, posters, window decals, and printed materials. Files ready for print and real-world applications.

items.label: Rebranding
details: Restyling and modernization of established identities. Clean-up, order, and coherence for a stronger perception.

items.title: Core Analysis
items.description: Study of the brand's essence, values, identity, target, and competitors.

items.title: Concept & Brainstorming
items.description: Moodboards, visual research, ideas, and the very first hand sketches.

items.title: Proposal & Drafts
items.description: 1-2 logo and identity directions with palette, layout, and style.

items.title: Design System
items.description: Building the visual language: typefaces, modules, patterns, icons, grids.

items.title: Real Applications
items.description: Concrete materials: social, print, mockups, presentations. Final files ready for professional use.
